card.name: Bamf!
card.text: Exile target creature. You may return it to the battlefield under its owner's control. If you don't, return it to its owner's hand.

card.name: Blink
card.text: Vigilance Whenever Blink deals combat damage to a player, exile target creature you control, then return it to the battlefield under its owner's control.

card.name: Cable
card.text: Flash When Cable enters, return target artifact, instant, or sorcery card from your graveyard to your hand.

card.name: Mirage
card.text: Reach When Mirage enters, tap up to one target creature and put a stun counter on it. If you controlled that creature, draw a card. (If a permanent with a stun counter would become untapped, remove one from it instead.)

card.name: Nightcrawler
card.text: Flash When Nightcrawler enters, scry 1. Whenever Nightcrawler attacks, exile him. After blockers are declared, return him to the battlefield. If it's his owner's combat phase, he enters tapped and attacking.

card.name: Pixie
card.text: Flying When Pixie enters, scry 1. Then if you control another Mutant, draw a card.

card.name: Portal Hopping
card.text: Flash When this enchantment enters, exile up to one target creature, then return it to the battlefield under its owner's control. {3}{U}: Exile up to one target creature, then return it to the battlefield under its owner's control.

card.name: Psychic Knife
card.text: As an additional cost to cast this spell, return a creature you control to its owner's hand or pay {1}. Counter target spell.

card.name: Psylocke
card.text: Ninjutsu {1}{U} ({1}{U}, Return an unblocked attacker you control to hand: Put this card onto the battlefield from your hand tapped and attacking.) Whenever Psylocke deals combat damage to a player, you may draw two cards. If you do, discard two cards.

card.name: Shadowcat
card.text: Whenever Shadowcat enters or phases in, if you don't control a creature named Lockheed, create Lockheed, a legendary 2/2 blue Alien Dragon creature token with flying. At the beginning of your end step, Shadowcat phases out. (Treat it and anything attached to it as though they don't exist until its controller's next turn.)

card.name: Temporal Paradox
card.text: Put target creature or spell on top of its owner's library.

card.name: Warlock
card.text: You may have Warlock enter as a copy of any permanent on the battlefield, except his name is Warlock and he's an artifact in addition to his other types.

card.name: HERBIE
card.text: Flying Exhaust — {4}: Scry 2, then put two +1/+1 counters on H.E.R.B.I.E.. Activate only as a sorcery. (Activate each exhaust ability only once.)

card.name: Mister Fantastic
card.text: Whenever you draw a card, put a +1/+1 counter on Mister Fantastic. At the beginning of your end step, if you control four or more modified creatures, create a 2/2 colorless Robot creature token. (Equipment, Auras you control, and counters are modifications.)

card.name: Invisible Woman
card.text: Flash When Invisible Woman enters, put a shield counter on target creature you control. (If it would be dealt damage or destroyed, remove a shield counter from it instead.)

card.name: Thing
card.text: Ward {2} (Whenever this creature becomes the target of a spell or ability an opponent controls, counter it unless that player pays {2}.) You may have modified creatures you control deal combat damage as though they weren't blocked. (Equipment, Auras you control, and counters are modifications.)

card.name: Hypothesize
card.text: Put a +1/+1 counter on target creature you control. It can't be blocked this turn. Flashback {4}{U} (You may cast this card from your graveyard for its flashback cost. Then exile it.)

card.name: Venom
card.text: Menace Creatures you control with counters on them have menace. At the beginning of combat on your turn, put a +1/+1 counter on another target creature you control.

card.name: Carnage
card.text: Carnage enters with a +1/+1 counter on it. Whenever another creature you control dies, put a +1/+1 counter on Carnage. When Carnage dies, put its counters on target creature you control.

card.name: Scream
card.text: When Scream dies, each opponent loses X life and you gain X life, where X is its power.

card.name: Curiosity
card.text: Enchant creature Whenever enchanted creature deals damage to an opponent, you may draw a card.

card.name: Human Torch
card.text: Flying Whenever Human Torch attacks, if he's modified, you may switch his power and toughness until end of turn. (Equipment, Auras you control, and counters are modifications.)

card.name: Lost in the Multiverse
card.text: Counter target spell unless its controller pays twice {X}.

card.name: Founding of the Four
card.text: (As this Saga enters and after your draw step, add a lore counter. Sacrifice after III.) Draw two cards, then discard a card. Distribute a flying, vigilance, prowess, and +1/+1 counter among up to four target creatures you control. (Whenever you cast a noncreature spell, a creature with prowess gets +1/+1 until end of turn.) ​

card.name: Dragon Man
card.text: Flying When Dragon Man enters, look at the top four cards of your library. You may reveal a creature, Aura, or Equipment card from among them and put it into your hand. Put the rest on the bottom of your library in a random order.

card.name: Namor the Sub-Mariner
card.text: Ward {1} When Namor enters, create Trident of Neptune, a legendary Equipment artifact with "Equipped creature gets +2/+2 and has vigilance" and equip {3}.

card.name: Force Field
card.text: Choose one— • Untap target creature and put a shield counter on it. (If it would be dealt damage or destroyed, remove a shield counter from it instead.) • Tap target creature and put a stun counter on it. (If a permanent with a stun counter would become untapped, remove one from it instead.)

card.name: Knull, King in Black
card.text: Ward—Discard a card. When Knull enters, you may sacrifice another creature. If you do, create a 3/3 black Symbiote Dragon creature token. {4}{B}{B}: Symbiotes you control get +2/+2 and gain deathtouch until end of turn.

card.name: We Are Venom
card.text: At the beginning of your upkeep, you may pay 1 life. If you do, create a 1/1 black Symbiote creature token with "This token can't block" and "When this token dies, put a +1/+1 counter on target creature you control."

card.name: Anti-Venom
card.text: Flash When Anti-Venom enters, put a +1/+1 counter on target creature. It gains indestructible until end of turn.

card.name: Symbiote Spawning
card.text: You draw a card and you lose 1 life. Create a 1/1 black Symbiote creature token with "This token can't block" and "When this token dies, put a +1/+1 counter on target creature you control." Flashback {4}{B} (You may cast this card from your graveyard for its flashback cost. Then exile it.)

card.name: Klyntar Infection
card.text: Destroy target creature. Put a +1/+1 counter on a creature you control. It becomes a Symbiote in addition to its other types.

card.name: Scorn
card.text: Scorn enters with X +1/+1 counters on it. {3}{B}: Return Scorn from your graveyard to your hand.

card.name: Frenzied Strike
card.text: Target creature gets -X/-X until end of turn, where X is 3 or the greatest power among creatures you control, whichever is greater.

card.name: Toxin
card.text: Deathtouch Whenever Toxin attacks, you may sacrifice another creature. If you do, create two 1/1 black Symbiote creature tokens with "This token can't block" and "When this token dies, put a +1/+1 counter on target creature you control."

card.name: Shriek
card.text: Flying Whenever one or more creatures you control with counters on them deal combat damage to a player, exile the top card of that player's library. Until end of turn, you may play that card, and mana of any type can be spent to cast it.
